original_text: While Paul was still speaking to Agrippa, Festus shouted at him, ‘Paul, your mind is confused! You have learned many things. But all these things are making you crazy.’
korean_text: 바울이 이같이 변명하매 베스도가 크게 소리 내어 이르되 바울아 네가 미쳤도다 네 많은 학문이 너를 미치게 한다 하니

sentences.original_text: While Paul was still speaking to Agrippa
But all these things are making you crazy.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 모든 것들이 너를 미치게 만들고 있다.
